title: THOMAS FELLOWS RECORDS REQUEST (Tucson Police Department)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Arizona Public Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

Any and All Incident and Police Reports involving Thomas Ray Fellows Born 9/7/1981 and/or Cara Fellows and/or from the years 2007-2012 Including but not limited to 
incident and police reports from the following dates;
06/01/2008
09/06/2008
03/19/2010
05/28/2010
03/18/2011
06/17/2011
07/04/2011
10/21/2011

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

PCND

title: SB 9 lot split affidavit pursuant to 3 year owner occupancy requirement for lot split 4 unit construction

communications.subject: California Public Records Act Request: SB 9 lot split affidavit pursuant to 3 year owner occupancy requirement for lot split 4 unit construction
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Please provide a copy of the owner affidavit (a written statement confirmed by oath or affirmation, for use as evidence in court) of intent to occupy for a period of 3 years as required by SB 9 for lot splits in SFR zoned areas in order to accommodate 4 units /lot in aforementioned zoned areas. Lot description: 514 Blossom Lane, Redondo Beach, CA., 90278. Owner of record: Denis Khoo, current address:unk, email address: denis.khoo@gmail.com.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Roger Cook
